October  

On Sept PERIOD  I attended the Interfaith Celebration for Peace in the commons that was held as part of Unity in Diversity Week PERIOD

The reason that I attended was to hear NIUs Black Choir PERIOD I had attended one of their performances last spring and was anxiously anticipating hearing them again PERIOD

When they sang out the first note a smile stretched across my face PERIOD I was completely entranced by the incredible music they created PERIOD I only wish that more people were aware of the wonderful talent that the members of the choir possess I urge more people to attend a performance of the Black Choir PERIOD Once you hear them I guarantee that you will smile too PERIOD

Ilene Tokarz

Sophomore

The Northern Star is the studentproduced independent media at Northern Illinois University in DeKalb Ill PERIOD and is a limited public forum whose content is determined exclusively by its student editors PERIOD Information presented on this website and in its print products is not controlled by NIU administration faculty or staff PERIOD The Star publishes online at northernstar.info and sends out its TLDR newsletter Monday through Friday PERIOD

The Northern Star is the studentproduced independent media at Northern Illinois University in DeKalb Ill PERIOD The Northern Star covers NIU campus news DeKalb news NIU Huskie sports and northern Illinois entertainment PERIOD
